attributes.action: make it simple and affordable for neglected or abused pensioners to gain access to the Civil Justice System, without first having to gain permission or representation from an often financially motivated or disinterested legal profession.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Vulnerable pensioners who suffer criminal neglect or abuse in hospitals, care homes, etc. should have the same right to seek justice through the courts as any other. In theory they may have this right, in practice the numbers being allowed to exercise it are derisory. This scandal will continue until the seriousness of these offences is demonstrated by encouraging the threat of prosecution against those who might be tempted to practice them.
